io.fluo.api.observer

Class AbstractObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fluo.api.observer.AbstractObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypedObserver

    public abstract class AbstractObserver
extends Object
implements Observer
    Implemented by users to a watch a Column and be notified of changes to the Column via the Observer.process(TransactionBase, Bytes, Column) method. AbstractObserver extends Observer but provides a default implementation for the init(Map) and close() method so that they can be optionally implemented by user.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.fluo.api.observer.Observer
